title: Is Corki good anymore?
body:
So I have recently learned that Corki got a nerf. 

Normally I would dismiss something like this but apperently, this is a really big nerf onto his unltimate's damage. Is he viable anymore? Is it a good idea to take him into my ranked games? Is this just a minor rerf that i'm freaking out about? Idk, tell me below.
